metadata.title: CVE-2024-6600 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Due to large allocation checks in Angle for GLSL shaders being too lenientan out-of-bounds access could occur when allocating more than 8192 ints inprivate shader memory on mac OS. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128and Firefox ESR < 115.13.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
